title: Faculty-Led STEM Education Reform Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Development and application of innovative pedagogical methods through a collaborative instructor-learner system

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively propose at least three innovative approaches for STEM curricula with teaching teams
Learners can explain blended environment-based teaching community operational principles at ≥80% applicability level
Learners can revise instructional designs ≥2 times based on peer feedback and quantitatively evaluate improvements
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
